/circle6 If the exact date of the LMP is not known and it is late in the pregnancy, ask for the 
date when the foetal movements were fi rst felt. Th is is known as ‘quickening’ and is felt 
at around 20 weeks of gestation. Th is information would give a rough idea about the 
period of gestation, which needs to be correlated with the fundal height to estimate the 
gestational age. Calculate the EDD on this basis. A sp
